programme.title: What Is Space?

programme.title: Landsat

programme.title: Borderland / Mars: Red Dawn

programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Sea Devils, S03E05, The Doctor is captured by the Sea Devils and taken to their undersea base. There, he tries to make peace with the creatures, but his efforts are thwarted by the Navy.

programme.title: Episode 6
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Sea Devils, S03E06, The Sea Devils come to the surface and attack the Naval base. The Doctor is forced to create a machine that will awaken the creatures across the entire world.

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Mutants, S03E01, The Doctor is sent to a skybase orbiting the planet of Solos in the 30th century, where he must deliver a sealed message pod. Meanwhile, on the planet below, something is transforming the human population into hideous mutants.

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Mutants, S03E02, Ky flees to the planet's poisonous surface taking Jo with him while the Marshal, holding the Doctor captive, demands that he opens the message pod.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Mutants, S03E03, The Doctor searches for Jo in the caves of Solos. In the shadows the mutants prepare to attack.

programme.title: Episode 4
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Mutants, S03E04, The Doctor and Sondergaard make an amazing discovery in the caves of Solos while Jo falls into the Marshal's trap.

programme.title: Episode 5
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Mutants, S03E05, The Marshal's plans for Solos go disastrously wrong. Can the Doctor save the doomed planet in time to save Jo's life?

programme.title: Episode 6
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Mutants, S03E06, The Marshal is on trial, with the Doctor as chief witness. But Jo and the Doctor's friends are the Marshal's prisoners. Will the Doctor dare to reveal the truth about the Marshal's crimes?

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Time Monster, S03E01, Masquerading as research scientist, Professor Thascales, the Master is using a device called TOMTIT to summon an ancient and powerful creature from beyond time.

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Time Monster, S03E02, The Doctor tracks the Master down to the Newton Institute. There, after a disastrous attempt to summon Kronos, the Master prepares to use TOMTIT once again.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Time Monster, S03E03, Krasis, High Priest of Atlantis has been summoned by the Master to help him find the crystal of Kronos. The Master uses TOMTIT to summon threats from the past to attack UNIT.

programme.title: Episode 4
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Time Monster, S03E04, As UNIT approaches, the Master leaves for Atlantis in his TARDIS. However, the Doctor is not far behind and in the time vortex, the two Time Lords confront each other.

programme.title: Episode 5
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Time Monster, S03E05, Arriving in Atlantis, the Master seduces the beautiful Queen Galleia so that he might possess the crystal of Kronos. But it is protected by a guardian who is half man, half beast.

programme.title: Episode 6
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Time Monster, S03E06, With the crystal of Kronos in his possession, the Master prepares to release the Chronovore. The Doctor is powerless to stop his nemesis as the end of Atlantis approaches.

programme.title: A Telling Silence

programme.title: Secrets and Lies

programme.title: The Dance

A Wish Come True, 20150131000000 +0000, A down-on-her-luck birthday girl suddenly receives everything she ever wished for, only to realize the happy life she wanted was right in front of her all along. Stars Megan Park, Benjamin Hollingsworth and Dean Cain.

After All These Years, 20130420000000 +0000, When a woman is wrongly accused of the death of her ex-husband, she sets out to solve the murder mystery and find the real killer before the day of the funeral, when she is to be taken into custody.

After the Glory, 19921129000000 +0000, A group of WWII veterans returning to their small midwestern town , find in the strong-arm tactics of local politicians, the same tyranny they went off to fight against and band together to defeat it at home.

programme.title: Serpent's Song
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E18, SG-1's arch-enemy Apophis is dying and seeks sanctuary with O'Neill. But what he really wants is a new host in exchange for his knowledge of the Goa'uld. Will O'Neill grant his request or send him back to the Goa'uld to face his fate?

programme.title: One False Step
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E19, On a routine recon mission, the SG-1 team discovers a new, friendly life form. But the encounter turns deadly for the new race because of a virus SG-1 inadvertently introduces. Can SG-1 develop a vaccine before this plague eradicates a civilization?

programme.title: Show And Tell
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E20, A boy mysteriously appears at SGC and pleas for help, claiming the Goa'uld are chasing him to find a race of invisible beings. But the SG-1 team doesn't know that the invisible aliens plan to destroy humanity…and their invasion has already begun!

Stargate SG-1, S02E21, A solar flare sends the SG-1 team back to 1969, where the U.S. military suspects the team of espionage. O'Neill and his team escape with two Woodstock-bound kids, desperate to find the Stargate before they're stuck in the psychedelic past forever.

programme.title: Out Of Mind
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E22, O'Neill awakens, seemingly from a 79-year cryogenic sleep, to find that his team is long dead. He soon discovers that it's all a setup and he is actually a prisoner of the Goa'uld, who intend to learn all his secrets…and then destroy him!

programme.title: Into The Fire
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E01, Hathor captures O'Neill and implants him with a destructive Goa'uld symbiote that could eventually kill him. Meanwhile, O'Neill's rescue party is defeated by Hathor's invincible energy barrier and time is running out. Is there a way to save O'Neill?

programme.title: Seth
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E02, When SG-1 hunts for a Goa'uld lord living on Earth, they discover this powerful alien in the form of a religious leader with an armed cult following. O'Neill faces off with both government agents and the cult in a clash that may destroy them all.

programme.title: Fair Game
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E03, O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) attempts to stop a massive Goa'uld invasion of Earth. But to call off the attack, the Goa'uld lords demand the destruction of the Stargate. O'Neill doesn't fully trust them - but the fate of Earth lies in the balance.

programme.title: Legacy
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E04, A mysterious tablet discovered on a distant planet infects anyone who touches it with a hallucinogen. The remarkable stone infects Teal'c and, before long, the entire team except Hammond. Can Hammond (Don S. Davis) stop it and save SG-1 alone?

programme.title: Learning Curve
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E05, As part of an exchange program with the planet Orban, O'Neill travels to Earth with a girl who possesses incredible technical knowledge. But by the time O'Neill discovers the truth behind the child's superior mind…it may be too late for them all.

programme.title: Point Of View
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E06, Alternate reality versions of Carter (Amanda Tapping) and Kawalsky (Jay Acovone) are found in Area 51. Brought to Stargate Command, they start to deteriorate. However, return to their own reality means death, as their world was invaded by Goa'uld!

programme.title: Coup D'Etat
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E17, Col. Sheppard's team is urgently summoned to M1K-177, where Maj. Lorne's team has been attacked. When Sheppard and his unit arrive, however, all they find is a burned building containing charred bodies: presumably, Lorne and his men.

programme.title: Michael
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E18, Lt. Kenmore wakes up in the infirmary without his memory. He begins to think there is something wrong when his nightmares about being a Wraith seem to be more than real. His fears would be unfounded if not for the serum that turns Wraiths humans.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E19, Sheppard and the team visits the planet Taranis at the invitation of two leading citizens, Dr. Norina Pero and Chancellor Lycus, who want McKay to repair a failing shield generator at an Ancient base, and Ancient warship, they've discovered.

programme.title: Allies
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E20, Kenmore arrives back in Atlantis with a group of Wraith, in the midst of a civil war. Kenmore, hoping to leverage his knowledge of Atlantis against Sheppard and the team, suggests a trade; Beckett's serum, in exchange for keeping Atlantis hidden.

programme.title: No Man's Land
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E01, After their alliance with the Wraith backfires, the team must find a way to stop two Hive ships that are headed for Earth. Weir orders to attack and Sheppard is forced to rely on Michael to help him save McKay and Ronon, who are being held prisoners.

programme.title: Misbegotten
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E02, Successfully using the retrovirus to turn an entire hive ship of Wraith into humans the team returns to Atlantis with their prisoners in stasis. Weir continues to defend her leadership in the face of an independent review being conducted by the IOA.

programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E11, Brandon is arrested for obstructing justice. David moves into the office at the After Dark and accidentally starts a fire. Valerie visits Sands and learns that Noah paid off David's debt.

programme.title: Friends In Deed
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E12, Dr. Monahan's behavior unnerves Kelly as he checks out her injured shoulder. Valerie warns Noah that he may be in over his head trying to manage the After Dark.

programme.title: Comic Relief
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E13, Dr. Monahan makes inappropriate advances toward Kelly. David and Valerie proceed with their plan to make their exes jealous. Steve performs at the After Dark's comedy showcase.

programme.title: Santa Knows
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E14, Kelly considers filing sexual harassment charges against Monahan, but does not want to interfere with a fundraiser for the clinic. Val and David realize how much they mean to each other.

programme.title: Ready Or Not
